entry.title: dvdisaster 0.79.3 released
entry.summary: For GNU/Linux, the SG_IO driver is used by default for accessing optical drives. This resolves the problem with system freezes on parallel SCSI adapters which were caused by the old CDROM_SEND_PACKET driver. The RS03 codec now contains [...]

entry.title: Added Windows and Mac OS X versions for 0.72.2
entry.summary: Windows and Mac OS X versions of 0.72.2 are now available. They were built using the updated development environment of 0.79.x. This results in shipping with newer versions of the GTK+ libraries and might yield slightly different visuals [...]

entry.title: dvdisaster 0.72.2 released
entry.summary: This version introduces a workaround which prevents parallel SCSI adapters from freezing under Linux. Improved upward compatibility with dvdisaster 0.79.x. [...]

entry.title: dvdisaster 0.79.2 released
entry.summary: Mac OS X binaries are available again as the Mac OS X development environment has been updated for this version. RS03 codec development progresses, but is still far from being finished. [...]

entry.title: Started new development branch 0.79
entry.summary: The first version of the new development branch (0.79.1) has just been released. This release is meant for testing new functions; it is not recommended for doing productive work. See the download page for information on what has been [...]

entry.title: Assessment of potential vulnerabilities in the windows version of the GTK library
entry.summary: The Windows versions of dvdisaster 0.70.x/0.72.x are shipped with an outdated GTK library containing vulnerabilities in its image processing routines. To exploit the vulnerability, manipulated images need to be loaded from an external [...]

entry.title: Project represention on SourceForge may be outdated
entry.summary: Due to the recent functionality changes on SourceForge we are unable to upload the News, Downloads and CVS contents in time. Please refer to the respective sections on this site (http://dvdisaster.net) instead. [...]

entry.title: dvdisaster 0.72.1 released
entry.summary: Pablo Almeida provided a Portuguese translation for the screen text. Added workaround to avoid Win XP freezing on certain CD-RW/drive pairs. Update: The workaround is not complete. If the problem persists please try version 0.79.x. [...]

entry.title: выпущен dvdisaster 0.72
entry.summary: Это первая стабильная версия ветки 0.72. Игорь Горбунов завершил перевод онлайн-документации на русский язык. Устранены некоторые [...]
